content: join to work in the round together with their wraps place marker for beginning of rounds continue working your chosen stitch pattern for about 5in/12cm or to desired foot length leg ending after round 1 or round 5 of the cable work stitch pattern of choice for about pattern after round 3 or round 11 of the 10in/25cm or to desired leg length ending lattice pattern or after round 7 of the chevron after round 6 of the cable or lattice pattern or pattern ending after round 7 of the chevron pattern toe heel with color a if working chevron pattern with color a if working chevron pattern round 1 k10 k2tog to end 66 sts decreasing short row round 2 k row 1 rs k16 w&t round 3 k9 k2tog to end 60 sts row 2 ws p32 slipping stitch marker when round 4 k you come to it w&t round 5 k8 k2tog to end 54 sts row 3 k30 w&t round 6 k row 4 p28 w&t round 7 k7 k2tog to end 48 sts row 5 k26 w&t round 8 k row 6 p24 w&t round 9 k6 k2tog to end 42 sts row 7 k22 w&t round 10 k row 8 p20 w&t round 11 k5 k2tog to end 36 sts row 9 k18 w&t round 12 k row 10 p16 w&t round 13 k4 k2tog to end 30 sts row 11 k14 w&t round 14 k row 12 p12 w&t round 15 k3 k2tog to end 24 sts increasing short row round 16 k row 13 k12 k1 decrease with wrap w&t round 17 k2tog to end 12 sts row 14 p13 p1 decrease with wrap w&t round 18 k row 15 k14 k1 decrease with wrap twice w&t cut yarn leaving 6in/15cm tail thread through row 16 p16 p1 decrease with wrap twice w&t remaining stitches pull tight and tie off row 17 k18 k1 decrease with wrap twice w&t row 18 p20 p1 decrease with wrap twice w&t finishing row 19 k22 k1 decrease with wrap twice w&t using tapestry needle and co tail sew loose row 20 p24 p1 decrease with wrap twice w&t end of i-cord to the center back of the leg to row 21 k26 k1 decrease with wrap twice w&t form a loop with which to hang your stocking row 22 p28 p1 decrease with wrap twice w&t weave in ends and block © 2021 carissa browning all rights reserved pattern for personal use only
